headline: My Favourite Four Stocks Right Now
summary: With markets at all-time highs, investors with uninvested cash may be feeling left out. Check out the four stocks that I'm following closely.

headline: Elevance Health (NYSE:ELV) Removed From Russell Indices in June 2025
summary: Elevance Health (NYSE:ELV) experienced a 11% decline over the past week, coinciding with its removal from several Russell indices in late June 2025. This removal potentially reduced investment appeal and visibility in the market. While the broader market rose by 2% in the same period, Elevance's decline indicates company-specific challenges. The overall market movement, impacted by global trade tensions and tariff concerns, contrasted with the stock's trajectory, emphasizing the significance...
